00054     class _OgreExport HighLevelGpuProgram : public GpuProgram
00055     {
00056     protected:
00058         bool mHighLevelLoaded;
00060         GpuProgramPtr mAssemblerProgram;
00061 
00063         virtual void loadHighLevel(void);
00065         virtual void unloadHighLevel(void);
00069         virtual void loadHighLevelImpl(void);
00072         virtual void createLowLevelImpl(void) = 0;
00074         virtual void unloadHighLevelImpl(void) = 0;
00076         virtual void populateParameterNames(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params) = 0;
00078         void loadImpl();
00080         void unloadImpl();
00081     public:
00083         HighLevelGpuProgram(ResourceManager* creator, const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00084             const String& group, bool isManual = false, ManualResourceLoader* loader = 0);
00085         ~HighLevelGpuProgram();
00086 
00087 
00095         GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr createParameters(void);
00097         GpuProgram* _getBindingDelegate(void) { return mAssemblerProgram.getPointer(); }
00098 
00099 
00100 
00101     };
00102 
00109     class _OgreExport HighLevelGpuProgramPtr : public SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram> 
00110     {
00111     public:
00112         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr() : SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram>() {}
00113         explicit HighLevelGpuProgramPtr(HighLevelGpuProgram* rep) : SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram>(rep) {}
00114         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr(const HighLevelGpuProgramPtr& r) : SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram>(r) {} 
00115         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr(const ResourcePtr& r) : SharedPtr<HighLevelGpuProgram>()
00116         {
00117             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00118             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00119             {
00120                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00121                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00122                 pRep = static_cast<HighLevelGpuProgram*>(r.getPointer());
00123                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00124                 if (pUseCount)
00125                 {
00126                     ++(*pUseCount);
00127                 }
00128             }
00129         }
00130 
00132         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr& operator=(const ResourcePtr& r)
00133         {
00134             if (pRep == static_cast<HighLevelGpuProgram*>(r.getPointer()))
00135                 return *this;
00136             release();
00137             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00138             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00139             {
00140                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00141                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00142                 pRep = static_cast<HighLevelGpuProgram*>(r.getPointer());
00143                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00144                 if (pUseCount)
00145                 {
00146                     ++(*pUseCount);
00147                 }
00148             }
00149             return *this;
00150         }
00152         HighLevelGpuProgramPtr& operator=(const GpuProgramPtr& r);
00153     };
00154 
00155 }
